subject: Re: Accepted desktop-base 4.0.2 (source all)
body:
don't forget to include this fix in etch r1.

Ter, 2007-05-22 às 09:17 +0000, Fathi Boudra escreveu:

> Description: 
>  desktop-base - common files for the Debian Desktop
> Closes: 422043
> Changes: 
>  desktop-base (4.0.2) unstable; urgency=low
>  .
>    * Fix dir_config path in kdeglobals and kdesktoprc doesn't support symlink.
>      (Closes: #422043)
